resources.string: Stylish Font is made with Motive to provide stylish look to Smart Phone with attractive Fonts. It has various fonts with instant preview so you can take a look how exactly font will look. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology.

You can set your application to download fonts by using Android Studio 3.0. To help you get started with the Downloadable Fonts features, you can use the font provider from Google Play services. Note: A device must have Google Play services version 11 or higher to use the Google Fonts provider.
